drupalNodeEvent.title: Asia focused PE leader on his new book, Money Games and market outlook

field_description.processed: Join SupChina for a CEO webinar featuring the Chairman and CEO of PAG Private Equity Weijian Shan. At this Webinar Shan will discuss his new book “Money Games: The Inside Story of How American Dealmakers Saved Korea’s Most Iconic Bank” as well as current market outlooks.
